sentences.en: Auric Goldfinger: I trust he will be more successful.
sentences.cn: 金手指: 我信任他会更告.

sentences.en: Auric Goldfinger: You are quite right , Mr. Bond . You are worth more to me alive.
sentences.cn: 金手指: 说的很对于, 邦德教员. 着对于我更有效.

sentences.en: Last, let us synthesize our large chakras and auric field.
sentences.cn: 最后, 让我们合成我们的大脉轮及金场.

sentences.en: Now anchor your source firmly into the feet , pushing it out throughout your auric field.
sentences.cn: 现在将你的源头牢牢锚定到足部, 将它遍布你的金场.

sentences.en: Our personal guardian angel resides in our auric field.
sentences.cn: 我们个人的守护天使,居住在我们的金场.

sentences.en: Then visualize that your energy is'blending with the etheric layer of your auric field.
sentences.cn: 然后想象你的能量与你金场的以太层混合在一起.

sentences.en: You do not touch the person -- just the auric field of that person.
sentences.cn: 你不接触人的身体—仅仅是切割人的光场.

trans.tran_cn: 金的，含金的，似金的，（化合物）正金的
trans.tran_en: of or containing gold in the trivalent state
